sentences.en: ‘I’m coming!’ she called down the stairs.
sentences.cn: “来啦！”她朝楼下喊道。

sentences.en: a love song that calls forth sad memories.
sentences.cn: 一首引起我悲伤回忆的爱情歌曲

sentences.en: Are you calling me a liar?
sentences.cn: 你在说我撒谎吗？

sentences.en: call in a specialist.
sentences.cn: 邀请一个专家

sentences.en: call off a trip; called the trip off.
sentences.cn: 取消旅游；推迟旅游

sentences.en: Call off your dogs.
sentences.cn: 叫住你的狗

sentences.en: call out the guard.
sentences.cn: 将卫兵集合起来

sentences.en: called up reserve troops for active duty.
sentences.cn: 征召后备役军人服役

sentences.en: calling in silver dollars.
sentences.cn: 回收银币

sentences.en: Check us in at the hotel and wait for my call.
sentences.cn: 去宾馆替我们办理好入住手续，然后等我的电话。

sentences.en: Has the boss called in today?
sentences.cn: 老板今天打电话来了吗?

sentences.en: he is seeking to call attention to himself by his crimes.
sentences.cn: 他想用犯罪的方法来使自己受到关注。

sentences.en: he is seeking to call attention to himself by his crimes.
sentences.cn: 他想用犯罪的方法来使自己受到关注。

sentences.en: He said he'd call again, and hung up on me.
sentences.cn: 他说他会再打过来，就突然挂断了电话。

sentences.en: I call upon you to tell the truth.
sentences.cn: 我要求你说真话

sentences.en: I called her back at noon.
sentences.cn: 中午我回她电话

sentences.en: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.cn: 我听到远处有人在叫。

sentences.en: I wouldn't call it a burden; I call it a responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我不觉得这是负担；我觉得它是一种责任。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to call so late, but I need a favour.
sentences.cn: 这么晚打电话真是抱歉，可是我需要帮个忙。

sentences.en: I’ll call you soon.
sentences.cn: 我马上打电话给你。

sentences.en: I’ll give you a call at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 我到周末给你打电话。

sentences.en: If the phone rings say you'll call back after dinner.
sentences.cn: 如果有电话打来，就说你吃完饭再回电话。

sentences.en: It’s cheaper to make calls after 6 pm.
sentences.cn: 下午6点以后打电话便宜些。

sentences.en: Kaifu threatened to dissolve the Parliament and call an election.
sentences.cn: 卡夫威胁要解散议会并举行选举。

sentences.en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
sentences.cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

sentences.en: Management called the laid-off workers back.
sentences.cn: 经理召回了被解雇的工人们

sentences.en: Members obediently answered the calls for funds.
sentences.cn: 会员都顺从地响应了募集资金的号召。

sentences.en: My chauffeur will call for you at seven.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车司机七点钟会到你那儿去取

sentences.en: our active participation as spectators is called into play. .
sentences.cn: 我们作为观众的积极参与发挥了作用。

sentences.en: She calls her father every couple of days.
sentences.cn: 她隔几天就给她爸爸打个电话。

sentences.en: She heard him call her name .
sentences.cn: 她听到他叫她的名字。

sentences.en: Sheila was just sneaking out when her mother called her.
sentences.cn: 希拉正要溜出去，这时她妈妈叫她了。

sentences.en: Social institutions are now being called upon to provide assistance to the homeless.
sentences.cn: 社会机构现在被要求向无家可归者提供帮助

sentences.en: stories that call up old times.
sentences.cn: 使人怀旧的故事

sentences.en: Tell her I'll call her back later, I'm running late again.
sentences.cn: 告诉她我过会儿会给她回电话，我又要晚了。

sentences.en: the call of an owl
sentences.cn: 猫头鹰的叫声

sentences.en: The company has called back all such models built in 1990.
sentences.cn: 公司已收回所有1990年的机型以便修理

sentences.en: The housekeeper moved smartly to the Vicar's desk to answer the call.
sentences.cn: 管家迅速来到牧师的书桌前接电话。

sentences.en: The teacher called me down for disobedience.
sentences.cn: 因我不听话，老师训斥了我

sentences.en: The worst thing is when you call friends and they've gone out.
sentences.cn: 最糟糕的事情是，你给朋友打电话，而他们却出去了。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentences.en: This news calls for champagne.
sentences.cn: 这个消息值得开香槟酒庆祝

sentences.en: Those familiar with Sanders call him a consummate politician.
sentences.cn: 那些熟悉桑德斯的人都称他为手段高明的政治家。

sentences.en: What time did Tony call?
sentences.cn: 托尼是什么时候来电话的？

sentences.en: Why should they get first call on the best property?
sentences.cn: 凭什么最好的房产尽着他们先挑？

sentences.en: work that calls for patience.
sentences.cn: 需要耐心的工作

sentences.en: Would you call me as soon as you find out?
sentences.cn: 你一弄清楚了就给我打电话好吗？

sentences.en: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.cn: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.en: You were just in time. Whew! What a close call.
sentences.cn: 你可真及时。嚯，真是好险呢！

words.tran_cn: 随时可偿还的；请求即付的
访客；[通信] 呼叫者；打电话者；召集员
职业；欲望；点名；召集；邀请
召；呼唤（call的现在分词）；称之为
电话；[通信]呼叫；要求；访问

phrases.tran_cn: 收回处理：调回（有缺陷的产品）以供修复
(北美)打由受话人付款的电话
由教堂公布结婚人姓名；自动通报
打电话：用电话与别人联系
使（或要求）…开始运作，启用
提交，提出：拿出来供采取行动或讨论；提出
需要：一项或一系列的需要
警钟；叫醒服务；电话叫醒服务

trans.tran_cn: 打电话，叫声，呼吁，请求，需求，吸引力，呼唤，决定，裁决，短暂拜访
trans.tran_en: when you speak to someone on the telephone

trans.tran_cn: 称呼，把…说成，喊，叫，打电话，召唤，召集，拜访，停留，取消（比赛等）
trans.tran_en: to say or shout something loudly so that someone can hear you
to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

trans.tran_cn: 把…叫做；打电话给；叫；呼唤；召开
